item.title: loadin
item.content:encoded:
Access to Loading Dock

To access the loading dock: put this address into your map:

2426 Dayton Way, Beverly Hills, CA 90210

The service entrance & loading dock is located off Dayton Way, in between Canon Drive and Beverly as shown below. 

Dayton is a one way street that can only be accessed via Beverly.

item.title: Pink Moon Pop Up
item.content:encoded:
Seeking Talented and Driven Chef or Team to Launch a Pop-Up Wine Bar & Small Plates Concept

Located at 235 Canon Drive in the heart of Beverly Hills, this is a unique opportunity for an experienced and ambitious individual or team to showcase their culinary expertise. The previous operator achieved an average of $4K in daily sales, demonstrating the potential of this prime space.

We’re offering:

  • Free rent (valued at over $7K/month) for three months.

  • A small opening budget to help you get started.

  • The possibility of a long-term partnership for the right fit.

We’re looking for someone who’s not only creative and passionate about food and wine but also hungry to build something remarkable.

This is a time-sensitive opportunity as our landlord requires the space to remain operational, so we’re seeking a quick transition from the previous pop-up.

If this sounds like the perfect challenge for you, email us at parker@tommysbeverlyhills.com or fill out the form below.

You can take a deeper dive into the location, former tenants at the bottom of this page.

Name *
Phone
Thank you!

Helpful Links/Further information about the opportunity 

Former pop up concept IG / Former upstairs venue IG   / Original Listing

item.title: About Us
item.content:encoded:
Make it

It all begins with an idea. Maybe you want to launch a business. Maybe you want to turn a hobby into something more. Or maybe you have a creative project to share with the world. Whatever it is, the way you tell your story online can make all the difference.

Don’t worry about sounding professional. Sounds like you. There are over 1.5 billion websites out there, but your story is what’s going to separate this one from the rest.
